win-win.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a win-win situation, solution etc is one that will end well for everyone involved in it
win-win.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: It’s a win-win situation all around.
win-win.translation[1].definitions[0].de: used to describe a situation in which both sides involved gain something or are successful
win-win.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The extra earnings available to lenders and the facility provided for borrowers make it a win-win situation.
A spokesman for the company called the contract a ‘win-win’ settlement.
